name: The Kaldaren War
description:
Sidescrolling space shooter.

Use your skills in dodging and shooting to destroy the enemy.

Use up to three different weapons at the same time.

Establish a highscore in the endless survival bonus stages.

And if you still havent enough, activate the hardmode and play all over again with stronger enemys and less health and power.

And remember dying is fun. :)

This is the Desktop Version of the game!

PLEASE ONLY BUY THIS IF YOU LIKE TO SUPPORT ME!

You can play the game for free at:

http://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/670017

http://www.kongregate.com/games/dsminor/the-kaldar...
